Flow.description: Update Contact Status on new Degree Program record | TEASAS, EN task (no reactivate EN)

value.stringValue: OR( AND( ISNEW(), TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Status__c ) = 'Commit to Enroll', [Degree_Program__c].Degree_Code__c != 'AAN', [Degree_Program__c].Degree_Code__c != 'ASN', CONTAINS([Degree_Program__c].Student_Name__r.Special_POP_Codes__c , 'TEASAS') ), AND( TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Status__c ) = 'Commit to Enroll', [Degree_Program__c].Degree_Code__c != 'AAN', [Degree_Program__c].Degree_Code__c != 'ASN', CONTAINS([Degree_Program__c].Student_Name__r.Special_POP_Codes__c , 'TEASAS') ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3
formulas.expression: OR( AND( ISNEW(), TEXT({!myVariable_current.Student_Status__c} ) = 'Commit to Enroll', {!myVariable_current.Degree_Code__c} != 'AAN', {!myVariable_current.Degree_Code__c} != 'ASN', CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Student_Name__r.Special_POP_Codes__c} , 'TEASAS') ), AND( TEXT({!myVariable_current.Student_Status__c} ) = 'Commit to Enroll', {!myVariable_current.Degree_Code__c} != 'AAN', {!myVariable_current.Degree_Code__c} != 'ASN', CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Student_Name__r.Special_POP_Codes__c} , 'TEASAS') ) )

value.stringValue: OR( AND( ISNEW(), TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Status__c ) = 'Commit to Enroll', [Degree_Program__c].Degree_Code__c != 'AAN', [Degree_Program__c].Degree_Code__c != 'ASN', CONTAINS([Degree_Program__c].Student_Name__r.Special_POP_Codes__c , 'TEASAS') ), AND( TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Status__c ) = 'Commit to Enroll', [Degree_Program__c].Degree_Code__c != 'AAN', [Degree_Program__c].Degree_Code__c != 'ASN', CONTAINS([Degree_Program__c].Student_Name__r.Special_POP_Codes__c , 'TEASAS') ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3_pmetrule
formulas.expression: OR( AND( ISNEW(), TEXT({!myVariable_old.Student_Status__c} ) = 'Commit to Enroll', {!myVariable_old.Degree_Code__c} != 'AAN', {!myVariable_old.Degree_Code__c} != 'ASN', CONTAINS({!myVariable_old.Student_Name__r.Special_POP_Codes__c} , 'TEASAS') ), AND( TEXT({!myVariable_old.Student_Status__c} ) = 'Commit to Enroll', {!myVariable_old.Degree_Code__c} != 'AAN', {!myVariable_old.Degree_Code__c} != 'ASN', CONTAINS({!myVariable_old.Student_Name__r.Special_POP_Codes__c} , 'TEASAS') ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5_pmetrule
formulas.expression: OR( AND( ISNEW(), TEXT({!myVariable_old.Student_Status__c} ) = 'Enrolled-Active', {!myVariable_old.Degree_Code__c} != 'AAN', {!myVariable_old.Degree_Code__c} != 'ASN', CONTAINS({!myVariable_old.Student_Name__r.Special_POP_Codes__c} , 'TEASAS') ), AND( TEXT({!myVariable_old.Student_Status__c} ) = 'Enrolled-Active', {!myVariable_old.Degree_Code__c} != 'AAN', {!myVariable_old.Degree_Code__c} != 'ASN', CONTAINS({!myVariable_old.Student_Name__r.Special_POP_Codes__c} , 'TEASAS') ) )

value.stringValue: OR( AND( ISNEW(), TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Status__c ) = 'Enrolled-Active', !ISBLANK([Degree_Program__c].Academic_Advisor__c ), [Degree_Program__c].Status_Date__c = [Degree_Program__c].Enrollment_Date__c, TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Name__c.Contact_Status_Advising__c ) != 'FAS Complete' ), AND( TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Status__c ) = 'Enrolled-Active', !ISBLANK([Degree_Program__c].Academic_Advisor__c ), [Degree_Program__c].Status_Date__c = [Degree_Program__c].Enrollment_Date__c, TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Name__c.Contact_Status_Advising__c ) != 'FAS Complete' ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_7
formulas.expression: OR( AND( ISNEW(), TEXT({!myVariable_current.Student_Status__c} ) = 'Enrolled-Active', !ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Academic_Advisor__c} ), {!myVariable_current.Status_Date__c} = {!myVariable_current.Enrollment_Date__c}, TEXT({!myVariable_current.Student_Name__r.Contact_Status_Advising__c} ) != 'FAS Complete' ), AND( TEXT({!myVariable_current.Student_Status__c} ) = 'Enrolled-Active', !ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Academic_Advisor__c} ), {!myVariable_current.Status_Date__c} = {!myVariable_current.Enrollment_Date__c}, TEXT({!myVariable_current.Student_Name__r.Contact_Status_Advising__c} ) != 'FAS Complete' ) )

value.stringValue: OR( AND( ISNEW(), TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Status__c ) = 'Enrolled-Active', !ISBLANK([Degree_Program__c].Academic_Advisor__c ), [Degree_Program__c].Status_Date__c = [Degree_Program__c].Enrollment_Date__c, TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Name__c.Contact_Status_Advising__c ) != 'FAS Complete' ), AND( TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Status__c ) = 'Enrolled-Active', !ISBLANK([Degree_Program__c].Academic_Advisor__c ), [Degree_Program__c].Status_Date__c = [Degree_Program__c].Enrollment_Date__c, TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Name__c.Contact_Status_Advising__c ) != 'FAS Complete' ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_7_pmetrule
formulas.expression: OR( AND( ISNEW(), TEXT({!myVariable_old.Student_Status__c} ) = 'Enrolled-Active', !ISBLANK({!myVariable_old.Academic_Advisor__c} ), {!myVariable_old.Status_Date__c} = {!myVariable_old.Enrollment_Date__c}, TEXT({!myVariable_old.Student_Name__r.Contact_Status_Advising__c} ) != 'FAS Complete' ), AND( TEXT({!myVariable_old.Student_Status__c} ) = 'Enrolled-Active', !ISBLANK({!myVariable_old.Academic_Advisor__c} ), {!myVariable_old.Status_Date__c} = {!myVariable_old.Enrollment_Date__c}, TEXT({!myVariable_old.Student_Name__r.Contact_Status_Advising__c} ) != 'FAS Complete' ) )

value.stringValue:
AND( OR ( [Degree_Program__c].Service_Program_Code__c = 'UG', [Degree_Program__c].Service_Program_Code__c = 'GL', [Degree_Program__c].Service_Program_Code__c = 'CT'),
OR ( TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Degree_Type__c ) = 'A', TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Degree_Type__c ) = 'AA'),
AND( [Degree_Program__c].School__c != 'School of Nursing', TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Status__c ) = 'Specialist Approved') )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_9
formulas.expression:
AND( OR ( {!myVariable_current.Service_Program_Code__c} = 'UG', {!myVariable_current.Service_Program_Code__c} = 'GL', {!myVariable_current.Service_Program_Code__c} = 'CT'),
OR ( TEXT({!myVariable_current.Degree_Type__c} ) = 'A', TEXT({!myVariable_current.Degree_Type__c} ) = 'AA'),
AND( {!myVariable_current.School__c} != 'School of Nursing', TEXT({!myVariable_current.Student_Status__c} ) = 'Specialist Approved') )

value.stringValue:
AND( OR ( [Degree_Program__c].Service_Program_Code__c = 'UG', [Degree_Program__c].Service_Program_Code__c = 'GL', [Degree_Program__c].Service_Program_Code__c = 'CT'),
OR ( TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Degree_Type__c ) = 'A', TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Degree_Type__c ) = 'AA'),
AND( [Degree_Program__c].School__c != 'School of Nursing', TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Status__c ) = 'Specialist Approved') )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_9_pmetrule
formulas.expression:
AND( OR ( {!myVariable_old.Service_Program_Code__c} = 'UG', {!myVariable_old.Service_Program_Code__c} = 'GL', {!myVariable_old.Service_Program_Code__c} = 'CT'),
OR ( TEXT({!myVariable_old.Degree_Type__c} ) = 'A', TEXT({!myVariable_old.Degree_Type__c} ) = 'AA'),
AND( {!myVariable_old.School__c} != 'School of Nursing', TEXT({!myVariable_old.Student_Status__c} ) = 'Specialist Approved') )

Flow.label: SSC_DegreeProgram_Task_Process
